body_content.explanation: a device for taking photographs or making films or television programmes:
examples: I forgot to take my camera with me to Portugal, so I couldn't take any photos.
Television camera crews broadcast the event all round the world.
It was said of Marilyn Monroe that the camera loved her (= that she looked very attractive on film and in photographs).

body_content.explanation: appearing on a section of video:
examples: They were caught on camera as they brutally attacked a man.
